Package hac.repo.subamrine

Class Submarine

java.lang.Object
hac.repo.subamrine.Submarine
@Entity public class Submarine extends Object
The `Submarine` class represents a submarine entity in a game. It contains attributes and behaviors related to the submarine's size, hits, position, and validation.

    • Submarine

      public Submarine(long id, int size, int hits, int firstRow, int firstCol, int lastRow, int lastCol)
      Parameterized constructor for the `Submarine` class.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the submarine.
      size - The size of the submarine.
      hits - The number of hits the submarine has received.
      firstRow - The row index of the first cell occupied by the submarine.
      firstCol - The column index of the first cell occupied by the submarine.
      lastRow - The row index of the last cell occupied by the submarine.
      lastCol - The column index of the last cell occupied by the submarine.
